item.description:
Dive Certification Course

For those of you that participated in the Introduction to SCUBA diving meetup, and anyone that may be interested, we are offering a group certification course.

If you need to be re-certified please sign up here and mention this when you call. Also make a comment here.

Here's what you need to do to register and find out more;

> Call the dive shop @ (603) 432-3483 and schedule a time to visit.

> When you visit, you'll; learn the details, register for the program, and be issued your course study material. Mike or Sue will explain the classroom procedure, and it's actually a home study class for the academic portion. They will then ask your dates/times of availability for pool sessions, and coordinate everyone's input such that we can all meet at the same day/time as a group.

The word SCUBA is an acronym for Self Contained Underwater BreathingApparatus and refers to the equipment which allows properly trained scuba divers to safely explore the underwater environment.

At the heart of a scuba diver’s training is learning how this equipment works and the procedures and techniques for its safe use in a course of study that leads to certification.

Diver training consists of three components:

1. Academic or classroom study,

2. Confined Water or pool training and

3. Open Water training.

 

Please sign up here so I know who is planning to take this course. Also mention Dana & Meetup when you register.

My cell # is (603) 759-9876 should you have any questions.


Heads up.....a dive vacation to Curacao will be planned for the Winter of 2013-14!
item.how_to_find_us: Sign up here and then call Sue & Mike at Aquatic Escapes Dive Center @ (603) 432-3483

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: SCUBA Certification Course & Re-Certification Course
